info:
It looks similar to one from before, but different. Doesn't it look really tough? And because it's gathering up energy, it's not even attacking back... *Chuckle*, although it's fun playing with something that fights back, there's different fun in playing with one that doesn't. Hey, commander. You don't plan on sending anyone else, right? If you leave it to me, I'll play with juuuust a bit before it finishes gathering up the energy.


- From Sadius
